alert.note: Alert for Dixie; Lafayette; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 06 at 5:23AM EST until January 06 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lafayette County in Big Bend Florida... Dixie County in Big Bend Florida... Eastern Taylor County in Big Bend Florida... * Until 700 AM EST. * At 523 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Luraville to 19 miles west of Steinhatchee, moving east at 40 mph. There are reports of trees and power lines down in the Perry area with these storms. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mayo, Perry, Cross City, Steinhatchee, Pinland, Tennille, Shamrock, Jug Island, Clara, Cross City Airport, Old Town, Buckville, Dekle Beach, Jonesboro, Jack Lee Island, Grady, Hatch Bend, Foley, Salem, and Perry-Foley Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
